snippet: Balancing a trend-obsessed digital life with Dashiell Hammett, Sam Cooke and a business card case.
abstract: Download interview with Kevin Allocca, the manager of YouTube Trends, which tracks and analyzes viral Web videos; Allocca offers recommendations for books, music and television programs.
lead_paragraph: Balancing a trend-obsessed digital life with Dashiell Hammett, Sam Cooke and a business card case.

headline.seo: Catching Up With Kevin Allocca of YouTube Trends
